entities.name: firenze
entities.description: Firenze is a centaur who is concerned with what has been foretold. He is described as rearing on his hind legs in anger and bellowing at Bane.

entities.name: bane
entities.description: Bane is a centaur who is angry and kicking his back legs. He is concerned with what has been foretold.

entities.name: ronan
entities.description: Ronan is a centaur who is nervous and speaking in a gloomy voice.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a human who is accompanying Firenze on his journey. He has to grab Firenze's shoulders to stay on when Firenze rears up.

relationships.description: Firenze and Bane are arguing about whether they should be concerned with what has been foretold.
Firenze and Harry are accompanying each other on their journey through the forest.
